transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hello, I need to refill my Jardiance prescription, it's for my diabetes.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Oh, I'm sorry. I was trying to reach Walgreens for a refill on my Jardiance. Could you direct me to the right number or transfer me?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Alex?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: No, my name is Robert Kowalski. I'm trying to refill my Jardiance prescription. Could you help me with that?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it. I can help with your refill request. Could you please provide your date of birth?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm your details. I have your name as Robert Kowalski and your date of birth

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: as September twelfth nineteen fifty three. Is that correct? If so, could you please spell your first and last name for me?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that's correct. My first name is Robert, R-O-B-E-R-T, and my last name is Kowalski, K-O-W-A-L-S-K-I.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I can't access your information right now, but I can make sure our clinic support team follows up with you.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I'd appreciate that. Just to confirm, I'm looking to refill my Jardiance, J-A-R-D-I-A-N-C-E, 25mg for diabetes. Thank you for your help.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Please hold while I document your request for a Jardiance refill.
